## Overview


- <span style="color: black;">This application predicts the next word given a two word prefix</span>

- <span style="color: black;">The model is trained based on Katz's back-off algorithm</span>

- <span style="color: black;">Text data were collected from English language blogs, news, and twitter</span>

- <span style="color: black;">You can enter your two word prefix to the App developed in shiny app and it gives you three most probable next words</span>

- <span style="color: black;">The main aspect of this app is "simplicity"</span>
